ðŸ“– Summary: The AI Video Transcriber is an open-source tool that transcribes and summarizes video content from various platforms like YouTube and TikTok. It uses AI for speech-to-text conversion, text optimization, and multi-language summarization, offering a mobile-friendly interface and real-time progress tracking.
